Name: Shabti for Wahibre-em-akhet
Description: This finely formed mummy figure with base and back pillar is carrying an adze and a hoe in his hands. The basket behind the left shoulder is delicately woven. The shabti spell was carved onto the body in nine lines. Wahibre-em-akhet was a prophet of the Lady of the Sycamore House, i.e. the goddess Hathor.
